name: Check Barcode

format:
<script>
    var el = document.querySelectorAll("input[type=\"text\"")[0],
    
        setFocus = function() {
            if (el) {
                el.focus();
            }
            
            setTimeout(setFocus, 100);
        };
    
    setFocus();
    
</script>
